entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
